name: mopey
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
feeling unhappy or disappointed so that you lack energy and feel unwilling to do things: The work stopped him from feeling mopey. She crossed her arms and pulled a mopey face.
making you feel sad or without hope: Have you ever made mopey mix tapes about a breakup? It's an intolerably mopey film.
More examplesFewer examplesLately he's become a bit mopey about his single life. Living with a mopey teenager is no fun.Some of the subject matter is quite mopey.It's not the mopey kind of blues, it's the tap your feet kind of blues.
